entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 18. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight and ending before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
